TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OperationOutput extends System.Web.Services.Description.OperationMessage

Docs.summary: Defines the specifications for output messages returned by the XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Exactly one instance of this class is a member of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation.Messages%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Operation> instance.
The OperationOutput class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `output` element enclosed by the `operation` element that is in turn enclosed by the `portType` element. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
